PropertyInfo.Name: ProgressColour
PropertyInfo.Signature2: System.Tuple`3[[System.Byte, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.Byte, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.Byte, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]] ProgressColour

ModuleInfo.Description:
Executes a congested transit assignment procedure for GTAModel V4.0.

Hard-coded assumptions:
  • Boarding penalties are assumed stored in UT3
  • The congestion term is stored in US3
  • In-vehicle time perception is 1.0
  • Unless specified, all available transit modes will be used.
This tool is only compatible with Emme 4 and later versions
